alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and northern Miami-Dade Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fortymile Bend, or 27 miles northwest of Homestead General Airport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loop Road Ee Center, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Fortymile Bend, Big Cypress National Preserve and Everglades National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
